name: Dr. Ahmed Mostafa
description: A passionate computer scientist with over 10 years of experience in teaching algorithms and data structures. He focuses on simplifying complex topics to make them easier for students to understand.

name: Eng. Sara Hassan
description: Front-end developer and instructor who loves helping students create modern, responsive websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Dr. Mohamed Fathy
description: AI researcher specialized in deep learning and neural networks. His lessons are filled with practical examples and real-world case studies.

name: Eng. Yara Adel
description: Cybersecurity expert with years of experience in ethical hacking and network defense. Her mission is to make online environments safer for everyone.

name: Prof. Omar Tarek
description: Data scientist who combines mathematics and programming to extract valuable insights from big data using Python and modern tools.

name: Eng. Layla Mahmoud
description: Full-stack mobile developer teaching Android and iOS development. She enjoys mentoring students to build real-world apps from scratch.

name: Eng. Karim Nabil
description: AWS certified cloud engineer who helps students understand cloud infrastructure and deployment of scalable web applications.

name: Dr. Nour El-Din
description: Networking instructor with vast experience in Cisco-based systems and routing technologies. He loves simplifying technical networking concepts.

name: Eng. Mariam Saad
description: Creative designer focusing on user-centered interfaces. She teaches design thinking and how to build products people love to use.
